charinfo.name: Edo Tensei Kimimaro (S)
charinfo.description: Edo Tensei Kimimaro (S) is back and he is wreaking havoc. He has no problem shredding his enemies as he marches up and down the battlefield.

abilities.name: Dance of the Vine
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Kimimaro (S) uses Dance of the Vine and violently tears through the enemy team dealing 20 damage. Any enemy that falls to 5 health or less will be killed.

abilities.name: Shikotsumyaku
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Kimimaro (S) uses Shikotsumyaku on one enemy dealing 45 piercing damage. This skill cannot be countered.

abilities.name: Ten Finger Bullets
abilities.description: Using Ten Finger Bullets Edo Tensei Kimimaro (S) targets all enemies. Any target that uses a new skill will be dealt 20 damage that ignores invulnerability. Edo Tensei Kimimaro (S) gains 50% damage reduction during this skill. This skill is invisible.

abilities.name: Shikotsumyaku Defense
abilities.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Kimimaro (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
